title: Small Apartment, simple 1 bd (not a share) avail August
app_fee: for final applicant, app fee for background check
posting_body: Please read carefully if you are interested in applying.
APARTMENT FOR RENT; Available now or Aug 15th/Sep 1.
Showings starting this week!!
1-bedroom apartment, 1 bath.
***VERY Small Older Apartment Unit***
Rent $900/month (Negotiable), plus the tenant pays own heat, electric, and hot water est betw $50-170/month.
First, Last due at signing, Security deposit is negotiable.
Prefer a 12 month lease, but terms are negotiable.
Housing vouchers or agencies welcome to inquire.
This is a real apartment, not a share.
This Unit is 3 flights up the stairs.
(see last picture)
Each Room is very small, gets hot in summer, cold in winter:
* Tiny Galley kitchen with slant roof, smaller fridge, stove, sink, not much storage;
* Bedroom with slant roof, good for twin/full bed, Carpeted, 1 window, cedar lined closet, access to emergency fire escape;
* Living room with slant roof, wood floors, 3 windows, built-in shelf/tiny closet;
* Bath with small standing shower and tiny sink--tiny space all around;
* Forced hot water heating, and if you chose to bring your own window AC, landlord can help you install it.
10 min walk to Field's Corner T, on Bus lines.
Friendly neighbors on our street!
On-street parking only, small shared yard, Not De-Lead Certified.
No Smoking, No growing indoors, and No pets... sorry.
Possible shared laundry machines in basement with the owner/other tenants.
Quiet hours and house rules need to be followed.
~ Preference to applicants who love Dorchester and want to live/stay/invest in our community here!
Showings starting this week!!
IMPORTANT:  Emails without ALL this info will not get a response:
A.
The names of the people who will be living/staying in the apartment.
B.  Your email address(s)
C.  Your best Tel number
D.  Some good times and days to call you in the next few days
E.  Anything else you want to ask, share or disclose.
F.  Please allow 1-3 days for my response, but every effort to call people will be made (from 978-area code).
IMPORTANT - please respond with A-E!
Thank you for your interest.
This post will be removed once the apartment is leased.
